net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.factory.util
Interface ConfigPropertiesSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
PropsFilePropertiesSource
public interface ConfigPropertiesSource

Interface for classes which act as a source for getting jawr configuration properties. An implementation should be able to read a properties file and load it.

Author:
Jordi Hernández Sellés

Method Summary
 boolean configChanged()
          Determine if configuration is changed to reconfigure Jawr during development without having to restart the server.
 java.util.Properties getConfigProperties()
          Read/modify configuration from a source (such as a .properties file) and return it.
